reviewText: Great video!!  For those that remember the American School or were Manila-Americans, it brings back great memories!!  It was professionally put together and edited.  Kudos to the producers.

I bought this for my mother who attended this school as a child in the 30's and early 40's, (so did I later), and we both were impressed with a lot of the footage included of pre-war Manila and the foreign community. it's worth seeing if you're interested, and especially if you went there.
